changeinfo.changes: - Now using ur0 config exclusively - Added auto-switch feature - Fixed some stuff
- Detect old installation (1.0 version with uma0 config) - Small change in menu - Rename ux0:tai folder - Update PSVita database on switch - Add an official changelog - Fix, always fix :)

- Use PSVita-StorageMgr instead of gamesdcard-microsd (thanks to @CelesteBlue-dev) - You can choose what mount point you want for your gamesdcard - Support the 3.68 PSVita Version - A lot of improvements inside :)
- Update PSVita-StorageMgr to 3.0 - Add switch option to add MCD to a new config file - A lot of improvements inside (always :p) - ImgBot reduce image file size by 20%
